queries.query: What are the latest developments in quantum computing? What are some of the key applications of quantum computing in the near future?
queries.ground_truth: Quantum computing has seen significant advances in error correction and qubit stability. Major companies like IBM and Google have achieved quantum supremacy and are working on scaling up their systems. Recent developments include improved coherence times and the development of new quantum algorithms.

queries.query: How has artificial intelligence impacted healthcare in the last 5 years?
queries.ground_truth: AI has revolutionized healthcare through improved diagnosis accuracy, drug discovery, and personalized treatment plans. Machine learning algorithms can now detect diseases from medical images with high accuracy. AI-powered systems are also helping streamline administrative tasks and improve patient care coordination.
